ThingDef.Name: PN_Shovel_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona PnL shovel
ThingDef.description: It's a small shovel. Useful for farming, mining and construction. It looks powerful even when used as a weapon.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PN_Chainsword_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona PnL chainsword
ThingDef.description:
[caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.

A sword with a rotating chain saw blade. It works by linking with the automaton and receiving power.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PN_Revolver_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona PnL revolver
ThingDef.description: A revolver similar to a shotgun that fires from six barrels at once.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PN_Rifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona PnL rifle
ThingDef.description: Lever action rifle produced by PnL industry. Users can choose between rapid fire mode and accuracy mode(WIP).\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PN_Machinegun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona PnL machine gun
ThingDef.description: Machine gun produced by PnL industry.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PN_Cannon_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona PnL portable cannon
ThingDef.description: portable cannon produced by PnL industry. It can fire high-explosive(WIP) and penetrating rounds.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PN_Chainlongsword_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona PnL chain longsword
ThingDef.description:
[caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.

A long sword with a rotating chain saw blade. It works by linking with the automaton and receiving power.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PN_WarHammer_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona PnL warhammer
ThingDef.description: A luxurious war hammer made by PnL industry. There is no special function.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PN_TwinPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona PnL twin pistol
ThingDef.description:
[caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.

A dual pistol that fires a lot of bullets at a close range. Used by the Royal Guard's Special Forces Automaton. In conjunction with the automaton, it enables fast reloading and gives the user high melee combat ability.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PN_RoyalRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona PnL royal rifle
ThingDef.description:
[caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.

royal guard rifle produced by PnL industry. Users can choose between rapid fire mode and accuracy mode(WIP).

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PN_RoyalHeavySlug_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona PnL royal heavy slug rifle
ThingDef.description:
[caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.

heavy slug rifle produced by PnL industry. They fire huge bullets, but it have a short range.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PN_RoyalMachinegun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona PnL royal machine gun
ThingDef.description:
[caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.

royal machine gun produced by PnL industry.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: PN_RoyalLSW_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona PnL multiple launcher (WIP)
ThingDef.description:
[caution] : Automaton exclusive weapon.

A launcher that can fire a variety of grenades. Users can fire Frag, Incendiary, EMP, Smoke, and Firefoam grenades.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
